name: Mad Dash (BricksParts, Kurnett)
description:
Welcome to Mad Dash, a game about using your dash to overcome unfair odds against you! This game was made for the TriJam54 event, and development was done within 3 hours (Expect bugs...). Much of the art was recycled from previous jam projects.

Controls:
Move: WASD or arrow keys
Dash: Space (dashes towards your cursor)

To win, eliminate all of your opponents by dashing through them or by using their attacks against themselves!

Code: Kurnett

Artwork: BricksParts
